name: mcp-ia
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP): Integraci√≥n de IA con Microservicios Usuarios - Reserva

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../mcp-server && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install
scripts.dev:all: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mcp" "npm run dev:gateway"
